Plot Title (Approx.): Vazão de Água Líquida Removida por Componente
Properties/Notes: Tracks H₂ vs O₂ streams side-by-side per component.

Plot Title (Approx.): Propriedades dos Drenos Individuais - Fluxo de {Gas}
Properties/Notes: Uses dual Y-axis for flow (Recirculation vs Process drains).

Plot Title (Approx.): Eficiência de Remoção de Gases Dissolvidos
Properties/Notes: Compares Input (Pre-Flash), Output (Post-Tank), and Final Mixer.

Metric(s) Plotted: Impurity Concentration (O₂ in H₂, H₂ in O₂)
Properties/Notes: Logarithmic scale; tracks crossover evolution against limits (e.g., 5 ppm).

Plot Title (Approx.): Fluxos de Energia e Consumo Total
Properties/Notes: Stacked/Grouped bars for Heat (H₂/O₂) and Work (H₂/O₂).

Plot Title (Approx.): Perfil de Temperatura e Conversão no Reator Deoxo
Properties/Notes: Dual Y-axis graph showing profile inside the Deoxo reactor.

Plot Title (Approx.): Carga Térmica (Q dot) por Componente e Fase
Properties/Notes: Stacked bars distinguishing Gas cooling vs Water condensation/cooling.

Plot Title (Approx.): Propriedades da Linha de Drenos Processadas
Properties/Notes: Line plot tracking state evolution across 3 specific drain processing points.

Plot Title (Approx.): Propriedades da Linha de Drenos: Válvula -> Mixer
Properties/Notes: Stacked bars comparing H₂/O₂ inputs vs Final Mixed Output.

Plot Title (Approx.): Rastreamento da Vazão de Água Líquida Acompanhante
Metric(s) Plotted: Liquid water flow in gas stream
Properties/Notes: Tracks liquid water carried over ("dragged") by the gas stream.
Compares water properties before and after makeup water addition.

Plot Title (Approx.): Rastreamento de Gases Dissolvidos na Linha de Dreno
Properties/Notes: Line plot specifically for dissolved gas tracking along drain treatment.
Specific plot for drains that are NOT recirculated.
